Title: Boyle-Linetti Wedding
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Matt O'Brien, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Brigitte Liebowitz (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: It's the day of Gina and Charles' parents' wedding, and the whole squad is given a job to fulfill for the ceremony. However, Jake and Amy get sidetracked chasing a criminal, and Terry struggles to officiate the wedding.
